data.text: Na Suhini Bildad buae se:
“Wobɛkɔ so aka saa nsɛm yi akosi da bɛn?
Onyankopɔn kyea atɛntrenee ana?
Bere a wo mma yɛɛ bɔne tiaa no no,
Nanso sɛ wode wʼani bɛto Onyankopɔn so
sɛ woyɛ kronkron, na woteɛ a,
Wo mfiase bɛyɛ nkakrankakra
“Bisa awo ntoatoaso a atwa mu no,
na wɔwoo yɛn nkyɛe na yennim hwee,
Wɔrenkyerɛkyerɛ wo na wɔrenka nkyerɛ wo ana?
So paparɔso betumi anyin akɔ soro wɔ baabi a ɛnyɛ ɔwora?
Bere a ɛrenyin a wontwae no,
Saa na wɔn a wɔn werɛ fi Onyankopɔn no awiei te;
Biribiara a nʼani da so no nni ahoɔden;
Otweri ne ntontan, nanso ɛtetew;
Ɔte sɛ afifide a wogugu so nsu yiye a esi owia mu,
Ne ntin nyin fa abotan ho,
Nanso sɛ wotu fi ne sibea a,
Ampa ara ne nkwa twa mu,
“Ampa ara Onyankopɔn mpo onipa a ne ho nni asɛm
Ɔbɛma woaserew bio,
Wɔde aniwu befura wɔn a wɔtan wo,
